overview: The BEST OF E.O.F.T. 19/20 is now available â€“ bring adventure and inspiration to your home by watching our best films of the past film tour via Video on Demand. You will be amazed by Eliott Schonfeld, minimalist adventurer, and his solo expedition in the Himalaya, laugh with Ron and Adam as they walk the length of Mongolia while golfing and feel the excitement with Master Polar Guide Sarah McNair-Landry.
tagline: THE BEST OUTDOOR AND ADVENTURE FILMS!
title: Best of E.O.F.T. 19/20 No. 16
